directories.title: Dariiqyada faylasha loo oggol yahay in lagu qoro
directories.db_alert:
Jidka soo socda ayaa ah halka qaabeynta, khalad gal iyo faylasha qeexitaanka la abuuri doono. Haddii aad rabto inaad bedesho magaca galkaan, beddel qeexitaanka DB_DIR ee kujira feylka definitions0.php oo dib u cusbooneysii boggan.

Haddii aad rabto inaad dib u magacawdo feylka qaabeynta, feylka qaladka, iyo feylasha qeexitaanka, bedel qeexitaannada CONFIG_FILE, ERROR_LOG_FILE iyo DEFINITIONS_FILE oo laga soo rogay feylka definitions0.php.

Haddii nidaamkaagu unix ku saleysan yahay, ka dibna u deji rukhsadda faylka la qori karo galka adoo adeegsanaya amarka soo socda:
%s

Kahor intaadan bilaabin rakibaadda, hubi inaad haysato dariiqa soo socda iyo inaad ogolaansho kuqorto galka:
directories.dir_perm_alert:
Kahor intaadan bilaabin rakibaadda, hubi in galka soo socda la heli karo iyo inaad fasax u haysato qoraal ugu dirto tusaha.

Haddii aad qorsheyneyso inaad adeegsato tusayaal aan ka ahayn hageyaasha soo socda, haddii tusaaluhu uusan ka jirin diskiga, marka hore abuur tusaha oo deji rukhsad qoraal ah oo ku saabsan agaasimayaashaas oo bilow rakibidda.

db_dir.label: Jidka loo maro feylasha qaabeynta, qoraalka qaladka, iyo qeexitaanada

directories.img_dir_alert: Tusaha soo socda ayaa la abuuri doonaa markii la keydinayo gallery-ka cusub. % d waxay muujineysaa Aqoonsiga gallery. Tusahaani waxaa lagu abuuri doonaa galka Jidka sawirka aasaasiga ah ee kor lagu sharaxay. Hubso in qaabka cinwaanadaasi sax yihiin.
directories.config_alert: Faylka qaabeynta ayaa la abuuray kahor. Sidaa darteed, ma ordi kartid rakibidda. Waa inaad marka hore tirtirtaa feylka qaabeynta ka dibna aad ku rakibtaa rakibidda.

info.title: Hagaha soo rar sawirka
info.body:
Xulo sawirrada qalabkaaga badhanka Baadh Sawirro oo ku dhaji goobta adoo wata badhanka Soo rar Sawirro b.
Foomamka Sawirka La Taageeray: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WEBP
Xallinta Ugu Yar ee La Oggol yahay: %d x %d px
Xallinta Ugu Badan ee La Ogolyahay: %d x %d px
Faylka Kaliya Xajmiga Ugu Badan: %d MB
Sawirka Tirakoobka Gawaarida: %d

exist.delete: Tirtir Sawirka la soo galiyay Goobta

new.delete: Tirtir Sawirka la soo galiyay Goobta

thumb.move: Sawirada waad ku kala sooci kartaa adigoo jiirka ku jiidaya.
thumb.move_mobile: Taabo oo farta ku hay shayga fartaada kuna sug inay doorato. Kadib xulashada shay, jiido fartaada si aad u kala saarto waxyaabaha.

uploader.uploading: Sawirro ayaa kor u kacayaku raran goobta. Ha xidhin bogga illaa inta buuxintu dhammaato.
uploader.error: Khaladaadka qaar ayaa dhacay intii faylalka loo dirayay serverka.
